name: Battle Merge
description:
Battle Merge combines the classic tile-matching puzzle with looting and crafting/merge mechanics to create the ultimate incremental loot grinding experience.

👆 Connect elemental blocks to battle monsters
💎 Craft/merge your acquired loot to increase its power
📈 Equip your best items to boost your character’s stats
👑 Use your shards to enchant your items to give them unique effects
🔄 Repeat the process to increase your power even further
